dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.tip.nrf.GroupTerminationPoint
dataStructure.description:
This object class represents simply a list of CTPs in the same Managed Element. GroupTerminationPoints (GTPs) can be cross connected. All CTPs in a GTP are either bidirectional or unidirectional. A GTP can serve as an end point as well as an interior point of an SNC. However, a GTP is not a CTP. For further information refer to attached supporting document SD1-3_BundledSNC. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0012 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0013

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity generates Object Creation notifications

This entity generates Object Deletion notifications

This entity generates Object Discovery notifications

This entity generates Attribute Value Change notifications.
dataStructure.label: GroupTerminationPoint

child.name: connectionState
child.description:
This attribute indicates the connectionState of the associated CTPs. All CTPs associated to a GTP shall have the same connectionState. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0037.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: connectionState

child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See R_TMF518_NRB_I_0001 and R_TMF518_NRB_I_0004. See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: isReportingAlarms
child.description:
This attribute provides an indication of whether alarm reporting for this GTP is administratively activated or de-activated. True = alarm reporting is activated; False = alarm reporting is de-activated.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: isReportingAlarms

child.name: asapRef
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association GroupTerminationPointHas

This association end is optional
child.label: asapRef

child.name: tpRefList
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association GtpContainsCtps

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC enabled
child.label: tpRefList
